response.original_title: JUL-294 The shocking piest image of the wife drowned in the kindness of the NTR instructor of the swimming class Aichi Shinkawa
response.overview: She has been married to her husband for seven years. My husband is so busy that he has almost no night life or conversation. When Aichi invites her husband to exercise, she is suggested to go to a swimming class where her friend Ichijo is coaching. It was Aichi who was pleased, but the husband retired the swimming class in several times. It becomes a standard to talk about the husband's complaint to the first article of the coach. And on the night of our wedding anniversary, Aichi, who was shocked to be told by her busy husband about her dinner, naturally thought of Ichijo's face, and when she noticed it, she went to the pool.
response.title: JUL-294 The shocking piest image of the wife drowned in the kindness of the NTR instructor of the swimming class Aichi Shinkawa
